Description:
Detects suspicious Windows strings in URI which could indicate possible exfiltration or webshell communication

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Windows Strings In URI
Query: (cs-uri-query="*=C:/Users*" OR cs-uri-query="*=C:/Program%20Files*" OR cs-uri-query="*=C:/Windows*" OR cs-uri-query="*=C%3A%5CUsers*" OR cs-uri-query="*=C%3A%5CProgram%20Files*" OR cs-uri-query="*=C%3A%5CWindows*")
